mapper.sql: ID, SUPPLIER_ID, ORG_NAME, TOTAL_PERSON, TOTAL_MANAGE, TOTAL_TECH, TOTAL_WORKER, SCALE_TECH, SCALE_HEIGHT_TECH, RESEARCH_NAME, TOTAL_RESEARCH, RESEARCH_LEAD, COUNTRY_PRO, COUNTRY_REWARD, TOTAL_BELTLINE, TOTAL_DEVICE, QC_NAME, TOTAL_QC, QC_LEAD, QC_DEVICE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_MAT_PRO (ID, SUPPLIER_ID, ORG_NAME, TOTAL_PERSON, TOTAL_MANAGE, TOTAL_TECH, TOTAL_WORKER, SCALE_TECH, SCALE_HEIGHT_TECH, RESEARCH_NAME, TOTAL_RESEARCH, RESEARCH_LEAD, COUNTRY_PRO, COUNTRY_REWARD, TOTAL_BELTLINE, TOTAL_DEVICE, QC_NAME, TOTAL_QC, QC_LEAD, QC_DEVICE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) values (#{id}, #{supplierId}, #{orgName}, #{totalPerson}, #{totalMange}, #{totalTech}, #{totalWorker}, #{scaleTech}, #{scaleHeightTech}, #{researchName}, #{totalResearch}, #{researchLead}, #{countryPro}, #{countryReward}, #{totalBeltline}, #{totalDevice}, #{qcName}, #{totalQc}, #{qcLead}, #{qcDevice}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_MAT_PRO

mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_MAT_PRO
SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId},
ORG_NAME = #{orgName},
TOTAL_PERSON = #{totalPerson},
TOTAL_MANAGE = #{totalMange},
TOTAL_TECH = #{totalTech},
TOTAL_WORKER = #{totalWorker},
SCALE_TECH = #{scaleTech},
SCALE_HEIGHT_TECH = #{scaleHeightTech},
RESEARCH_NAME = #{researchName},
TOTAL_RESEARCH = #{totalResearch},
RESEARCH_LEAD = #{researchLead},
COUNTRY_PRO = #{countryPro},
COUNTRY_REWARD = #{countryReward},
TOTAL_BELTLINE = #{totalBeltline},
TOTAL_DEVICE = #{totalDevice},
QC_NAME = #{qcName},
TOTAL_QC = #{totalQc},
QC_LEAD = #{qcLead},
QC_DEVICE = #{qcDevice},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id}

update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_MAT_PRO set SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId}, ORG_NAME = #{orgName}, TOTAL_PERSON = #{totalPerson}, TOTAL_MANAGE = #{totalMange}, TOTAL_TECH = #{totalTech}, TOTAL_WORKER = #{totalWorker}, SCALE_TECH = #{scaleTech}, SCALE_HEIGHT_TECH = #{scaleHeightTech}, RESEARCH_NAME = #{researchName}, TOTAL_RESEARCH = #{totalResearch}, RESEARCH_LEAD = #{researchLead}, COUNTRY_PRO = #{countryPro}, COUNTRY_REWARD = #{countryReward}, TOTAL_BELTLINE = #{totalBeltline}, TOTAL_DEVICE = #{totalDevice}, QC_NAME = #{qcName}, TOTAL_QC = #{totalQc}, QC_LEAD = #{qcLead}, QC_DEVICE = #{qcDevice}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.SUPPLIER_ID FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_MAT_PRO t1 LEFT JOIN T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_CERT_PRO t2 ON t2.MAT_PRO_ID = t1. ID WHERE t2.ID = #{id}
